### how to

cd benchmark
npm install
node perf.js


### Perf report

 **vault@1.1.8**

```
Benchmarking: keywrap
rfc3394#wrap#keywrap x 8,605 ops/sec ±3.16% (76 runs sampled)
rfc3394#unwrap#keywrap x 8,507 ops/sec ±3.66% (78 runs sampled)
rfc5649#wrap#keywrap x 10,021 ops/sec ±3.59% (80 runs sampled)
rfc5649#unwrap#keywrap x 8,392 ops/sec ±3.29% (75 runs sampled)
========================
Benchmarking: pputil
base64 decode#pputil x 312,449 ops/sec ±2.61% (83 runs sampled)
base64 encode#pputil x 1,228,860 ops/sec ±2.21% (87 runs sampled)
identify a base64 key#pputil x 14,665,432 ops/sec ±2.93% (85 runs sampled)
identify an encrypted key#pputil x 14,627,193 ops/sec ±1.14% (92 runs sampled)
========================
```
